entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.7°C

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 65 %
